slides.title: Basic Terms
slides.content:
**Cost Price (CP):** Price at which item is bought

**Selling Price (SP):** Price at which item is sold

**Profit:** SP > CP
**Loss:** SP < CP

slides.title: Finding SP
slides.content:
**When Profit:**
SP = CP × (100 + Profit%)/100

**When Loss:**
SP = CP × (100 - Loss%)/100
